full_summary:
================

### Government Tender Notice - Contract CB-4623-56100815

**Title:** Match Fuzee (Allumette-Tison)

**Tender Reference Number:** CB-4623-56100815

**Publication Date:** April 11, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** June 1, 2023, at 14:00:00 (EST)

### Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the supply of Match Fuzee (Allumette-Tison) to the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF). The requirement is for 10,000 packages of Match Fuzee, with 10 matches and one striker per package.

**Description:**
Match Fuzee are safety strike matches that are windproof and waterproof, producing a burn when struck. They are primarily used in military applications for fuse lighting, but may also be used by fire departments. The matches are to be delivered to two locations in Canada: Canadian Forces Ammunition Depot (CFAD) Dundurn in Saskatchewan and CFAD Angus in Ontario.

**Supply Requirements:**

* 4,000 packages of Match Fuzee to be delivered to CFAD Dundurn by December 1, 2023
* 6,000 packages of Match Fuzee to be delivered to CFAD Angus by December 1, 2023

**Security Requirements:** There are no security requirements associated with this procurement.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement.

**Tendering Procedures:**
All interested suppliers may submit a bid.

**Competitive Procurement Strategy:**
Lowest/Lower Bid

**Inquiries:**
Inquiries regarding this tender opportunity should be submitted to John Caldwell, DAAT 9-1-C, Department of National Defence, by telephone at (613) 858-6492 or by email at john.caldwell@forces.gc.ca.

** Documents:**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Note: The contract reference number is CB-4623-56100815. All participants are expected to review the tenders and contact information carefully before proceeding with an offer. Please direct any questions to John Caldwell, DAAT 9-1-C, at (613) 858-6492 or john.caldwell@forces.gc.ca. [1]
